articles.author: Sheena Vasani
articles.title: Nanoleaf’s latest sale drops its colorful smart light starter kits to as low as $50
articles.description: Both Nanoleaf’s Mini Triangle and Lines starter kits are discounted. Plus, there are deals available on Shokz’s unique OpenRun open-ear headphones and Lenovo’s lightweight ThinkPad X1 Nano laptop.
articles.content:
Plus, Shokzs OpenRun open-ear headphones are on sale

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Apple quietly revamps malware scanning features in newer macOS versions
articles.description: New version of XProtect is "as active as many commercial anti-malware products."
articles.content:
1 with 1 posters participating
